summary: Welcome to version 0.68.0 of MouseHunt Improved! There are quite a bug fixes and improvements in this release. Custom Horn and Custom Shield have been given some fancy new preview functionality, mice images are now upscaled, and more. Dark Mode has also been updated with many new styles, so please check it out if you haven't already. Happy hunting!

details.title: Better Inventory
items: Added ability to click on items in inventory to see item view for all items. Holding shift will open for crafting table ingredients

details.title: Better Items
items: Updated item view popup for Airship parts to show airship silhouette and format image correctly
Added details for what map a scroll is opened to along with links to MHCT mapper
Updated long descriptions for some items to remove unnecessary information
Updated styles
